org.spongepowered.api.world.gen.populator

Interface ChorusFlower.Builder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResettableBuilder<ChorusFlower,ChorusFlower.Builder>
    Enclosing interface:
    ChorusFlower

    public static interface ChorusFlower.Builder
extends ResettableBuilder<ChorusFlower,ChorusFlower.Builder>
    A builder for constructing ChorusFlower populators.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ChorusFlower build()
      Builds a new instance of a ChorusFlower populator with the settings set within the builder.
      ChorusFlower.Builder exclusionRadius(int radius)
      Sets the radius around the center (0, 0) of the world that this populator will not apply to.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.util.ResettableBuilder

        from, reset

    • Method Detail

      • exclusionRadius

        ChorusFlower.Builder exclusionRadius(int radius)
        Sets the radius around the center (0, 0) of the world that this populator will not apply to.

        This must be a positive value or zero.

        Parameters:
        radius - The exclusion radius
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • build

        ChorusFlower build()
            throws IllegalStateException
        Builds a new instance of a ChorusFlower populator with the settings set within the builder.
        Returns:
        A new instance of the populator
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If there are any settings left unset which do not have default values
